--- title: Activity Diagram - Mobile Attribute Minimization config: theme: base --- %% UML Activity (stateDiagram-v2 approximation) for attribute minimization flow. stateDiagram-v2 state "Receive requested attributes" as ReceiveRequest state "Validate requested attributes" as Validate state "Apply minimization policy
(selective disclosure where possible)" as ApplyMinimization state "Reject/Reduce over-request
and show warning" as RejectOrReduce state "Record privacy decision
(local audit)" as RecordDecision [*] --> ReceiveRequest ReceiveRequest --> Validate Validate --> ApplyMinimization: valid Validate --> RejectOrReduce: invalid/excessive ApplyMinimization --> RecordDecision RejectOrReduce --> RecordDecision RecordDecision --> [*]

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 然后，流程会走到 stateDiagram-v2 approximation 和 *。
好的，我把它画成一个矩形框，名字叫 'stateDiagram-v2 approximation 和 *'，对吧？
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
